title: Two Furnished Houses for rent in Old Littleton five minutes apart
posting_body: ['Two Furnished Houses for rent in Old Littleton five minutes apart.', 'No cats but DOG Friendly', 'The 1st house can be moved into immediately that rents for $5000/mo  and the 2nd house can be moved into May 15 that rents for $6000/mo.', '1st house has a 3 car garage but landlord keeps in for his Limo and car collection.', '  If you have to have the garage at the 1st house Landlord would give it up with an additional $1500/mo.', 'rent paid so the rent would go up to $12,500 for both houses Required 2 year lease on both houses.', 'The 2nd house includes the garage including Bronco Fan 2 garage  with fan room.', " If you don't need either garage you can deduct $1000/mo.", 'for the 2nd garage so total rent without both garages would be $10,000/mo.', "  Just finish this 40' by 6' wide by 6' tall completely enclosed dog run that has 2 separate doggie doors so your dogs can walk themselves whenever they want or play or enjoy the outdoors even when you're not there.", 'Half of the dog run also has a has a tarp system that keeps keeps snow and rain out of the dog run', 'And also provides shade for them..', 'No Cats please.', "Installed high end Astroturf for the Comfort of your canines and there's never mud in your house.", 'Even have a cold and hot water line in the dog run for easy cleaning of the atro turf.', 'Also just installed 2 brand new 50 gallon hot water heaters so has indoor hot tub for 2 upstairs and the 2 laundry centers will never have an issue with with having hot water there with a 100 gallons on reserve at all times.', 'Also have a 4 person Hot tub with built in lounger that has high powered jets for your calves and hamstrings that is being custom built in Pennsylvania for arrival by the end of March.', 'Fully furnished home 2 king beds 3 queen beds.', '2 Queen size futons and a Twin Sleeper even has a solid bassinet.', 'Has nice indoor/outdoor kitchen with 2 grills, huge frig, sink with extra hot line and prep cooler.', 'and back yard and 4 parking spaces on back driveway.', 'Old Littleton 2 level house house Brand new stack-able W+D included upstairs in walk-in closet and full size washer dryer high end set downstairs.', 'Also included that are already set up are 2 wall mount 65" Ultra HDTV\'s one on main level and one downstairs.', 'Sky lights in the kitchen and bathroom.', 'with large driveway parking for 4 cars.', 'No garage available-Landlord keeps garage.', 'If you want the garage which is 3 car which would run an additional $1500/mo.', '10 blocks from the Littleton light rail station and Downtown Littleton.', 'Mountain Views Private Deck 5 piece bath.', 'Incredible Mountain views from your 2 person jetted tub and copper double sinks and awesome 5 piece bath vaulted ceiling.', 'Master executive loft suite is super private away from the rest of the house in a private wing setting.', 'Massive Walk in closet with your own private brand new stack able washer and dryer.', 'Bedroom has a 2 way gas fireplace.', 'Also has 2 way gas fireplace in master suite and adjoining living room.', 'Master suite has private 2nd floor deck great for sunbathing and romantic cook outs for two.', 'ALL OF FURITURE AND 2 NEW TVS ALL INCLUDED.', 'IF YOU HAVE ALL OF YOUR OWN STUFF BE HAPPY TO RENT THIS HOUSE EMPTY', 'BUT THE RENTAL RATE WOULD BE THE SAME.', '$4999mo.', 'month with $4999 Security Deposit.', 'REQUIRED 2 YEAR LEASE.', 'Discounts available for additional years signed past the base 2 years.', 'Example 5 year deal would reduce the rent to $4699/mo.', 'And same deposit.', 'All utilities will be paid by tenants.', '1st months rent and deposit must be paid at lease signing and move in and key codes of your choice.', 'Top of the line key pad entry code locks so no keys to carry around.', 'The front part of the house that is completely separate from back part that is a 2 bedroom 1 bath is rented until 8/15/22 to a single man.', 'When he moves out you will have 1st choice on that space but it rents for an additional $2500/mo.', 'Close to Windimere and Ridge road..', 'Charming Fully Furnished House in Old Little ton front RV Parking.', 'Only 4 other houses in this Cul-da-sac.', "With 45' RV parking space in front.", 'The large RV space NOT for living in for parking storage only.', 'You can plug in with battery tenders to keep batteries fully charged.', '$5000/mo.', 'with $5000 Security on two year minimum deal.', "If you don't need the RV parking space the Landlord will store his Diesel Pusher there and you can subtract $500 from monthly rent.", 'Also can subtract $500/mo.', "if you don't need the 2 car garage", 'Tenant pays all utilities .', 'Very large driveway.', 'Parking for 4 cars and 2 additional.', 'New full size stackable washer and dryer in 2nd bedroom and New massive triple access Stainless Steel Frig.', 'All of the detective accessories will go with us that are in the pictures to furniture and 3 HD LED TV will remain for new tenants enjoyment with 3 remotes.', 'No Cats But small dogs OK.', 'Landlord will keep his office and storage room on the back part of the property both have a separate entry and will not have to bother tenants in anyway for access.', 'Call JDV 720 35seven 202nine', 'ALL OF FURITURE AND 5 ULTRA HD TVS ALL INCLUDED.', 'IF YOU HAVE ALL OF YOUR OWN STUFF BE HAPPY TO RENT BOTH THESE HOUSES EMPTY', 'BUT THE RENTAL RATE WOULD BE THE SAME.', 'NO DISCOUNT WITH BE OFFERED TO REMOVE ALL THE FURNITURE AND HAVE US STORE IT.']
